app.name: Comment Helper
app.short_description: Prevent accidental submission of internal note to customers
app.long_description: 1) Show notification on comment type change, 2) comments will not be copied over when toggle between public reply and internal note 3) Last comment before toggling the comment type will is saved in app for agent to insert into comment if necessary

PUBLIC_TO_INTERNAL.label: Copy comment from public reply to internal note?

INTERNAL_TO_PUBLIC.label: Copy comment internal note to public reply?

NOTIFICATION.label: Notify agent on comment type switch
